name: Gundemonium
description:
GUNDEMONIUM

fallen angel with a gun
and a deed never done

View the Ludum Dare page for a more readable version.

CONTROLS
  • Left and right arrow keys to move.
  • Up arrow key to jump up through a broken floor.
  • Down arrow key to break the floor, or jump down through a broken floor.
  • Space key to shoot.
DETAILS AND TIPS

Gundemonium is a grid-based, real-time arcade shooter. You will have to turn around to move and shoot in that direction.

Moving into enemies will melee them and kill them, but they can do the same to you.

Enemies can jump through the broken floors you create. Enemies are created when you enter a new depth. However, some only reveal themselves once you cross that depth.

You have 10 seconds to enter the next depth. Your time remaining is indicated by your fallen angel wings.
